comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: "Henry Pomeroy DAVISON, Sr. (June 12, 1867 - May 6, 1922) was an American banker and philanthropist." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henry_Pomeroy_Davison He was one of the partners in J.P. Morgan & Co, see articles with photos in The Evening standard., April 11, 1913, Page 6, The Ogden standard., June 05, 1913, 4 o'clock p.m. City Edition, Page 7

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: B-59: Thanks for catching the original caption's misspelling of the name and offering more information on Davison. We will amend and update the record.
